On Nov 17, 2008, at 7:17 AM, mike@... wrote:
> Having multiple URIs for multiple representations of the same  
> resource implies that they are separate resources. I can't see how  
> that approach is acceptable as a RESTful design.


Not to distract from the main point, but a resource can have any  
number or URIs.  However, a URI can at most represent one resource.

- Steve
